data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Niederösterreich, Austria. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Niederösterreich, Austria
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, move the 8,985 believers in the state of Niederösterreich to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.section_summary: On average, 119 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Niederösterreich, Austria.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Niederösterreich, Austria.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Niederösterreich.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Afghani, general people.
Lord, there are 1,058,785 people in the state of Niederösterreich who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Niederösterreich, Austria.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Niederösterreich, Austria by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
